b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe Walking Dead\xe2\x80\x9d Season 8 has promoted three actors to series regular status, Variety has confirmed.

Steven Ogg, Katelyn Nacon, and Pollyanna McIntosh will all have expanded roles when the AMC zombie apocalypse series returns this fall. Ogg plays Simon, the right-hand man to Savior leader Negan. Nacon is Enid, a teenage resident of Alexandria who has shown a connection to Carl. McIntosh plays one of the newest characters on the show, Jadis, leader of the junk yard scavengers.

Season 7 of the series saw the departure of several main cast members, including Steven Yeun and Michael Cudlitz, whose characters, Glenn and Abraham, were killed in the season opener. Sonequa Martin-Green, who played Sasha, died in the season finale. She will next star in the CBS All Access series \xe2\x80\x9cStar Trek: Discovery.\xe2\x80\x9d

Season 8 will pick up amidst the war between Rick\xe2\x80\x99s alliance and The Saviors. Series showrunner Scott Gimple previously said that the season will see Rick and company battling to preserve the very fragile civilization they have established.

\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s essentially for the whole world as far as their experience,\xe2\x80\x9d Gimple told Variety when the season concluded. \xe2\x80\x9cIt isn\xe2\x80\x99t just their little corner. It\xe2\x80\x99s the Kingdom and the Hilltop too. The Governor just wanted them dead. Negan would be happy if everyone was alive and well and working for him. There\xe2\x80\x99s a very basic political idea at play here. They want to live in a fair world instead of having it just be Negan\xe2\x80\x99s. To that end, that idea feels to me like the beginning of civilization is at stake, this new civilization they want to build rather than live this strange half-life serving a despot.\xe2\x80\x9d

TVLine first reported this news.'

b'In 1969, a nun in Baltimore went missing. Two months later, her body was found. Her name was Sister Cathy Cesnik. She was a beloved 26-year-old teacher at the local Archbishop Keough High School, and her death left the community confounded: Who would want to hurt this woman? Decades later, the case is still unsolved\xe2\x80\x94but the circumstances around it have grown wild and complex, with police desperate to determine if Cesnik\xe2\x80\x99s death had anything to do with a major sexual abuse scandal at the school. What did she know? And who, ultimately, used that information against her?

The mysterious murder is coming to light this spring thanks to Netflix, which is releasing a seven-part docu-series about Cesnik\xe2\x80\x99s death titled The Keepers. A new trailer, released on People, is giving true-crime fans a first look at the series, and is already striking an ominous, conspiratorial tone.

The trailer\xe2\x80\x99s main action is led by locals who knew Sister Cathy, particularly two former students who have never stopped trying to solve the devastating murder. After Cesnik\xe2\x80\x99s death, many quickly linked her case to the alleged covered-up sexual-abuse scandal by priest Father Joseph Maskell, who was accused of sexually abusing dozens of school girls. He later paid settlements to his accusers, per People.

But two of the accusers, Jean Wehner and Teresa Lancaster, decided to participate in the Netflix documentary, directed by Ryan White. The series digs into the allegations, attempting to untangle the dark web Maskell\xe2\x80\x94whom White describes as a \xe2\x80\x9csociopath\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x80\x94allegedly weaved, and trying to bring to light all the insidious participants who helped him get away it.

\xe2\x80\x9cThis is a story of accountability and, at best, dozens of people and institutions dropped the ball and didn\xe2\x80\x99t protect children and adults,\xe2\x80\x9d White tells People. \xe2\x80\x9cAt worst, dozens of people and institutions covered things up so it could never be brought to light or were directly involved in crimes.\xe2\x80\x9d

He adds that while many of the alleged perpetrators, including Maskell, died before being brought to justice, \xe2\x80\x9cthere are people still alive who I do believe need to be held accountable.\xe2\x80\x9d

True-crime stories have always been at the forefront of pop culture, but there\xe2\x80\x99s been a boom in recent years, thanks to the explosive success of podcasts like Serial, HBO\xe2\x80\x99s series The Jinx, and Netflix\xe2\x80\x99s own Making a Murderer. However, retelling crime stories often presents a problem when it comes to finding a fitting ending. Serial, for example, had an amazing run, but ended on a \xe2\x80\x9cYou be the judge\xe2\x80\x9d note that left many grasping for a more concrete finale. But though White was never focused on solving the murder of Sister Cathy, he feels strongly that the ending of this docu-series, unlike many true crime stories before it, will be promising: \xe2\x80\x9cI finished this project thinking this murder can be solved.\xe2\x80\x9d

Viewers will be the judge of that when Netflix releases the series on May 19.'

b'Melissa Etheridge has revealed that smoking cannabis with her children has brought them closer together.

The GRAMMY-winning singer became an activist for the drug after using it for medicinal purposes during her battle with cancer and says her kids now refer to it as medicine.



WATCH: Melissa Etheridge Says Brad Pitt Was Almost Her Sperm Donor

\xe2\x80\x9cMy children have a very clear understanding of cannabis,\xe2\x80\x9d the 55-year-old mom of four told Yahoo during an interview for their Weed & the American Family report. \xe2\x80\x9cWhen I hold it without shame or confusion they can understand it as simple as if I was pointing to a bottle of Percocet and saying, \xe2\x80\x98That\xe2\x80\x99s mama\xe2\x80\x99s medicine.\xe2\x80\x99 You take the naughtiness out of it and it\xe2\x80\x99s not something kids then run to.\xe2\x80\x9d

\xe2\x80\x9cI have smoked with my older two,\xe2\x80\x9d Etheridge continued, referring to 20-year-old daughter Bailey and 18-year-old son Beckett. \xe2\x80\x9cIt was funny at first and then they realized it\xe2\x80\x99s a very natural end-of-the-day and it brings you closer, so I\xe2\x80\x99d much rather have a smoke with my grown kids than a drink.\xe2\x80\x9d

The Kansas native underwent a lumpectomy and several rounds of chemotherapy and radiation after being diagnosed with breast cancer in 2004. Although doctors prescribed various prescription drugs to help her deal with the side effects of treatment, she took the advice of singer and close pal David Crosby and instead turned to medicinal marijuana.



WATCH: Melissa Etheridge Defends Brad Pitt, Says She \xe2\x80\x98Lost a Friend\xe2\x80\x99 When He Married Angelina Jolie

\xe2\x80\x9cIt was a wake-up call for me,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cWhen I used it as medicine, it became so clear to me that it has been maligned and misunderstood, and I really wanted to help people who are suffering. Going through chemotherapy is suffering\xe2\x80\xa6 and cannabis helps so many parts of just that. That\xe2\x80\x99s just the beginning of what it does medicinally.\xe2\x80\x9d

\xe2\x80\x9cI smoked to be normal. I smoked to be out of pain. I smoked to lighten myself because you\xe2\x80\x99re poisoning yourself with chemo,\xe2\x80\x9d she added. \xe2\x80\x9cIt wasn\xe2\x80\x99t about being high. It was just [getting] to a place where I could communicate with my children, to where I could get up, to where I could eat, where I didn\xe2\x80\x99t have to go to the hospital. It was great medicine.\xe2\x80\x9d

Despite beating cancer, Etheridge added that she still gets high today to maintain the \xe2\x80\x9chealth benefits,\xe2\x80\x9d like easing stress and sleeping better.



WATCH: Melissa Etheridge Opens Up About Surviving Breast Cancer

The musician, who is married to Linda Wallem, also noted that the drug has been \xe2\x80\x9cthe best marital aid.\xe2\x80\x9d

"When it's date night ... it takes down your inhibition; your sexual desires are enhanced,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cWe take a bath every night and smoke and talk and wind down and sleep a very, very good night's sleep -- and sleep is extremely important."

See Etheridge discuss her battle with cancer below.'

b'Jennifer Garner kept things simple as she celebrated her 46th birthday on Sunday

Jennifer Garner kept things simple as she celebrated her 46th birthday on Sunday.

b"The spark that will light the fire to destroy the First Order has been lit, and guess who\xe2\x80\x99s coming back to let it burn?

On Friday, Lucasfilm revealed the cast for J.J. Abrams\xe2\x80\x99 Star Wars: Episode IX, and unofficially told racist, sexist internet trolls to eat shit as the announcement included the return of actress Kelly Marie Tran as Rose Tico.

The film begins shooting in London\xe2\x80\x99s Pinewood Studios on August 1, and will be released in theaters in December 2019.

Earlier this summer, Tran deleted her only few social media accounts after a harassment campaign was carried out by a bunch of racist, sexist turd-golems who hated Rian Johnson\xe2\x80\x99s Star Wars: The Last Jedi. Instead of being normal people and doing anything else, these internet trolls opted to berate members of the cast and crew, with Tran receiving the brunt of their efforts.

There isn\xe2\x80\x99t proof, but a Facebook group with the unwieldy name \xe2\x80\x9cDown With Disney\xe2\x80\x99s Treatment of Franchises and Its Fanboys\xe2\x80\x9d claimed responsibility for the online harassment. Given that Tran is one of the franchise\xe2\x80\x99s few female characters of color (she is Vietnamese-American), of course things erred on the vile side of things.

In a statement that\xe2\x80\x99s since been deleted, the group lamented the \xe2\x80\x9cforced diversity\xe2\x80\x9d of the franchise and sought to \xe2\x80\x9cBring back the Straight White Male Hero,\xe2\x80\x9d even though that\xe2\x80\x99s not a thing that can go away. But they sure wanted to make Star Wars great again. Luckily, Tran isn\xe2\x80\x99t going anywhere.

'Star Wars: The Last Jedi' (2017) Lucasfilm

For Star Wars IX, Tran rejoins franchise vets like Mark Hamill, Anthony Daniels (C-3PO), and Billy Dee Williams (back as Lando Calrissian), and her fellow new era hitters Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Adam Driver, Lupita N\xe2\x80\x99yongo, and Oscar Isaac. The late Carrie Fisher, who died in 2016, will return through unused footage filmed for 2015\xe2\x80\x99s The Force Awakens.

Star Wars: Episode IX will be released in December 2019."

b'Daisy Ridley on porgs, Kylo Ren and more 'Star War: The Last Jedi' teasers

Bryan Alexander | USA TODAY

Show Caption Hide Caption Daisy Ridley talks porgs love and that 'Last Jedi' scream Daisy Ridley is a beautiful suspect in 'Murder on the Orient Express.' But the star is getting ready to board 'Star Wars: The Last Jedi.' Here's what we learned about her upcoming adventure.

Daisy Ridley can't escape her Star Wars fame, even as a mysterious murder suspect riding the opulent 1930's train in Murder on the Orient Express.

While filming Murder (in theaters now), director Kenneth Branagh offered to let Ridley use a lightsaber in a key scene (she declined) and co-star Josh Gad peppered her with Star Wars questions offset on video, even pulling in Judi Dench for one Force interrogation.

We, too, had a few queries as Ridley gets set to ride as Rey again in Star Wars: The Last Jedi (opening Dec. 15). Here's what we learned.

Ridley is so pro-porgs (Rey not so much).

The free world fell in love when the chubby porgs creatures made a screaming debut in The Last Jedi trailer last month. It hit Ridley, too. She lists a porgs toy as one of her prized possessions.

"It\xe2\x80\x99s bringing a lot of pleasure right now," says Ridley, calling the character "adorable" and "hilarious."

More: Daisy Ridley leaps from 'Star Wars' to force awakening in 'Murder on the Orient Express'

And: Daisy Ridley leaps from 'Star Wars' to force awakening in 'Murder on the Orient Express'

The love affair started on set with the goofy looking puppet, operated by the same crew who handle droid BB-8. "It\xe2\x80\x99s wonderful to be working around practical things on set that have such personality," says Ridley,

But Rey won't fall for the creature's charms. "Rey, honestly, is too wrapped up in her own journey to pay attention to porgs," says Ridley. "Which is a sad thing."

Snoke will provide the worst kind of 'test' for Rey.

Supreme Leader Snoke (Andy Serkis) ain't pretty and acts worse. "He looks mental. Snoke is an evil guy, if you can call him a guy," says Ridley.

Last Jedi's trailer shows Rey screaming under Snoke torture. Ridley says the torture scenes were long enough to leave her hoarse. "It was painful. My throat hurt after that one," says Ridley.

"Snoke is one of those tests for Rey," she adds. "And when I say testing, it's the worst use of testing ever."

Watch for Kylo Ren and Rey time.

Is there something special going on with Rey and the Dark Side-dwelling Kylo Ren (Adam Driver)? The two seem to have a special connection in the trailers.

Ridley choses her words carefully.

"These are two people who represent two very different sides of life, good and evil," she says. "That's going to be explored more in this."

Luke Skywalker is annoyed with Rey.

Rey is expecting Luke Skywalker to be thrilled to get his lightsaber back in Last Jedi. But he's not happy to see her. "She thinks there\xe2\x80\x99s going to be a warm welcome. But Luke went to this island to get away and he doesn\xe2\x80\x99t want to be disturbed," says Ridley.

Don't fret. Skywalker takes "a tremendous journey from the beginning of the relationship to ultimately where they end up in the film." Our personal theory: He had coffee.

Judi Dench really doesn't know squat about Star Wars.

Dench seems to be a Star Wars nut, grilling Ridley in one of Gad's videos on fan-minutia such as whether she had been tested for midi-chlorians, living cells in tune with the Force (from Episode I \xe2\x80\x93 The Phantom Menace).

She played the part well, but Dench doesn't have Force fever.

"She was like, 'Medi...Midi-chlorians, what is that?' Josh and I had to explain," says Ridley, who says she had Gad had to stifle their laughs when cameras rolled.

Dench did ask Ridley to shoot a personal Star Wars video for her grandson. "Obviously he's very interested."'

b'CLARKSVILLE, Indiana (KTRK) -- Police officers put their lives on the line every day, facing all kinds of danger. But it was a ferocious waterfowl that threatened Detective Hall on his way to work at the Clarksville Police Department in Indiana.Hall was attacked by a goose as he tried to walk down the sidewalk into the building.Clarksville P.D. Lieutenant Shane Basset shared footage from a surveillance camera at police headquarters saying, "Detective Hall forgot his keys... He then attempts to enter the building and is challenged by our local geese."Hall defended himself with a bag and eventually made it to his office.'

b'Almost a year after Prince was found unconscious in his Paisley Park home, search warrants from the investigation of his death were released on Monday, revealing that prescription medications were found all over his house, NBC News reports.

According to reports by E!, the documents filed last year provide clearer view into the days leading up to the star\xe2\x80\x99s accidental opioid overdose, including medications he acquired without prescriptions. According to the affidavits, substances were found within the compound, particularly in places that Prince regularly visited, like his bedroom and laundry room. Many pills were found stored in bottles for other medications, often in vitamin bottles. Per NBC News, some were in a suitcase labelled with a Prince alias, Peter Bravestrong, along with a handwritten lyrics to the 1987 hit \xe2\x80\x9cU Got The Look.\xe2\x80\x9d

According to E!, several medications were prescribed to Prince\xe2\x80\x99s longtime friend and aide, Kirk Johnson. Dr. Michael Todd Schulenberg, who saw Prince twice before his death, arrived on the premises on April 21 to drop off test results and when later questioned by authorities, NBC News reports he confessed that he prescribed oxycodone on April 16, 2016, the same day that the pop star\xe2\x80\x99s plane made a post-concert emergency landing when he \xe2\x80\x9cpassed out\xe2\x80\x9d while aboard after taking pain killer medication.

Warrant says that Schulenberg told investigators he put it under Johnson\xe2\x80\x99s name \xe2\x80\x9cfor Prince\xe2\x80\x99s privacy.\xe2\x80\x9d The doctor\xe2\x80\x99s attorney, however, said in a statement that he \xe2\x80\x9cnever directly prescribed opioids to Prince, nor did he ever prescribe opioids to any other person with the intent that they would be given to Prince.\xe2\x80\x9d

According to NBC News, investigators discovered a suitcase next to Prince\xe2\x80\x99s bed and found at least two bottles with pills prescribed by Schulenberg under Johnson\xe2\x80\x99s name on April 7: the anti-nausea drug ondansetron hydrochloride in a Vitamin D bottle, and the painkiller Percocet in a bottle labeled as ondansetron.

According to E!, documents stated that Johnson contacted Schulenberg to ease Prince with hip pain, for which he prescribed clonidine, hydroxyzine pamoate and diazepam, medications typically used for anxiety and high blood pressure. Johnson picked up the medicines the day before Prince\xe2\x80\x99s death and claimed it \xe2\x80\x9cwas the first time he had ever done something like that for Prince.\xe2\x80\x9d

Johnson told investigators he was \xe2\x80\x9cunaware Prince was addicted to pain medication.\xe2\x80\x9d But Andrew Kornfeld, the son of Dr. Howard Kornfield, who founded the Recovery Without Walls told detectives that Johnson had contacted them because the famed musician was struggling with opiate use, E! reports.

Per search warrants, Andrew was visiting the compound on the day of Prince\xe2\x80\x99s death to determine if the singer could be a candidate of their program. He was also found to be carrying several envelopes containing pills when he came to Paisley Park on that day, but did not have any prescriptions for them and is not a licensed doctor. He denied to officials that he had any intention of treating Prince with the medication.

Other revelations in the warrants, as per NBC News, stated that Prince communicated via his landline phone and through email, he stopped using cellphone after being hacked. Authorities also learned he had been in a romantic relationship with singer-songwriter Judith Hill since 2014. Hill was with Prince when he was briefly hospitalized after his plane made an emergency landing. Prince didn\xe2\x80\x99t have a regular doctor for most of his career and his team would arrange for a various doctors to give him B-12 shots before his performances.

\xe2\x80\x9cThe investigation remains active at this point,\xe2\x80\x9d The chief deputy for the Carver County Sheriff\xe2\x80\x99s Office Jason Kamerud told The New York Times. \xe2\x80\x9cWe\xe2\x80\x99ve gained a lot of progress over the last year, but there still is some more work to be done.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b''Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2': On set with Marvel's misfit space family

Brian Truitt | USA TODAY

Show Caption Hide Caption How Chris Pratt and Kurt Russell became space family Kurt Russell and Chris Pratt talk about playing an estranged father and son in 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' and bonding in real life.

Correction & clarifications: An earlier version of this report misidentified the location of Pinewood Studios. It is south of Atlanta.

FAYETTEVILLE, Ga. \xe2\x80\x94 Chris Pratt has the most awesome space dad ever.

On this sunny afternoon at Pinewood Studios just south of Atlanta, Kurt Russell is holding court on the set of Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (in theaters Thursday night), telling stories over a campfire. Not tales from Big Trouble in Little China or Escape From New York, though \xe2\x80\x94 Russell is in cosmic character as Ego, a living planet who\xe2\x80\x99s just met his long-lost son, Peter Quill, aka Star-Lord (Pratt).

Yes, you read that right: Russell plays an all-powerful living planet and that's not even the craziest aspect of the Guardians\xe2\x80\x99 corner of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. A talking raccoon, a sentient alien tree with a three-word vocabulary ("I am Groot") and the rest of this misfit accidental family took the world by storm with the 2014 runaway summer hitGuardians of the Galaxy. The sequel \xe2\x80\x94 which is on track to open with $150 million domestically \xe2\x80\x94 doubles down on the eye-popping new worlds, over-the-top personalities and family drama.

Trailer: 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' Baby Groot steals the show in 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2.'

"Guardians has gone from being an untested, little-known risky Marvel side project with an unusual cast and offbeat sensibility, to a premier brand worthy of its ascension to the coveted opening summer weekend slot," says Paul Dergarabedian, senior media analyst for comScore.

The biggest asset at the heart of this sci-fi space opera? A crew of \xe2\x80\x9cdamaged souls who are looking for some form of love or redemption and haven\xe2\x80\x99t really ever experienced either of those things,\xe2\x80\x9d says returning writer/director James Gunn.

\xe2\x80\x9cThe reason why so many people love this movie and feel so connected to these characters is because they\xe2\x80\x99re utterly outcasts and oddballs and strange," Gunn says. "They're not the Avengers, they're not the pitch-perfect group of guys who have everything going on. They\xe2\x80\x99re losers often, and even though they have some extraordinary abilities, they\xe2\x80\x99re no better or worse than we are.\xe2\x80\x9d

The Guardians \xe2\x80\x94 the rogueish Star-Lord, assassin Gamora (Zoe Saldana), overly literal warrior Drax (Dave Bautista), sarcastic yet damaged Rocket (voiced by Bradley Cooper) and adorably precocious Baby Groot (voiced by Vin Diesel) \xe2\x80\x94 have already saved the universe, though Peter is still in search of his real father after having been raised from childhood by space outlaw Yondu (Michael Rooker).

The sequel has them on the run from the conceited aliens known as the Sovereign, and after having saved the heroes from certain doom, Ego is enjoying a meal with his son on the forest planet Berhart, though Peter is curious why Dad never came back for him when his mother died and instead hired Yondu to pick him up.

\xe2\x80\x9cI would have done so myself, but I was in the midst of an outlandish adventure battling demonic forces to save this dimension or some such nonsense. I don\xe2\x80\x99t even recall. It all bleeds together after a while,\xe2\x80\x9d Ego explains. He wonders aloud why Yondu kept Peter instead of returning him, leaving Ego searching for his boy ever since.

\xe2\x80\x9cBecause I was a skinny kid who would squeeze into places adults couldn\xe2\x80\x99t and it made thieving easier,\xe2\x80\x9d says Quill, clad in a shirt sporting an alien candy logo.

Yet there\xe2\x80\x99s as much humor as serious stuff in a Guardians film, and Drax is the first to break the tension. \xe2\x80\x9cI thought Yondu was your father,\xe2\x80\x9d he says, leading everyone to look at the muscular warrior like he\xe2\x80\x99s nuts.

\xe2\x80\x9cWait. After all this time hanging out together, you thought Yondu was my blood relative?\xe2\x80\x9d Quill says in exasperation, leading Drax to deadpan, \xe2\x80\x9cYou look exactly alike.\xe2\x80\x9d

Rocket chimes in \xe2\x80\x9cOne\xe2\x80\x99s blue!\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x94 though Cooper hasn't yet added the furry guy\xe2\x80\x99s vocals. Gunn\xe2\x80\x99s brother Sean (who also returns as Yondu\xe2\x80\x99s Ravager buddy Kraglin) does Rocket\xe2\x80\x99s motion-capture performance and line reading with co-stars.

James Gunn has put together a close-knit clan of friends and actual family on his Guardians films, and it\xe2\x80\x99s reflected in the sequel\xe2\x80\x99s story of "fathers, sons, stepfathers, sons who have never seen their father, fathers who have lost their son,\xe2\x80\x9d Russell says. \xe2\x80\x9cAnd when they finally get back together, everybody\xe2\x80\x99s got to get used to each other. They\xe2\x80\x99re not quite the way you had made them out to be in your imagination.\xe2\x80\x9d

Adds Gunn: \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s a father/son story that could take place if your father\xe2\x80\x99s a living planet in another galaxy or if your father\xe2\x80\x99s a Wall Street broker."

Pratt is effusive with praise for his legendary co-star Russell. \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s a dream. I\xe2\x80\x99ve been a huge fan of his for ages. There\xe2\x80\x99s nothing disappointing about working with him,\xe2\x80\x9d says the actor, who enjoyed Russell\xe2\x80\x99s frequent stories from his heroic roles in such movies as Tombstone and Tango & Cash.

So how does an icon like Russell play a planet? He leans into the machismo and quirks of those old parts. \xe2\x80\x9cThere\xe2\x80\x99s a lot of baggage that\xe2\x80\x99s right for this in terms of the kinds of things I can bring as an actor to the table,\xe2\x80\x9d he says. \xe2\x80\x9cAnd some of the things we created years ago have an element of connection to this character.\xe2\x80\x9d

Gamora is skeptical of Ego\xe2\x80\x99s extreme interest in Peter, though she's also dealing with her adoptive sister and frenemy Nebula (Karen Gillan), a villain from the first film whom the Guardians have taken captive. Nebula is looking extremely irked while handcuffed as everybody else is gobbling Ego\xe2\x80\x99s blue space chow. (It\xe2\x80\x99s not very good, Russell reports. \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s prop Jell-O. We never ask questions, we just eat it.\xe2\x80\x9d)

But everybody needs and seeks a sense of belonging, even Nebula. \xe2\x80\x9cShe\xe2\x80\x99s been raised to be a killing machine and not have any empathy or emotion,\xe2\x80\x9d Gillan says. \xe2\x80\x9cHowever, she has these natural feelings toward her sister that she\xe2\x80\x99s trying to suppress but can\xe2\x80\x99t.\xe2\x80\x9d

Saldana is just glad to have more women around \xe2\x80\x94 not just Gillan but also new cast member Pom Klementieff, who plays the Guardians\xe2\x80\x99 insect-like telepathic ally Mantis. \xe2\x80\x9cThe older I get, the more I realize that it\xe2\x80\x99s pretty lonely being the only female in the cast,\xe2\x80\x9d Saldana says. \xe2\x80\x9cYou\xe2\x80\x99re going to be surrounded by a whole bunch of dudes talking about their (manhood) and bodybuilding and eating healthy.\xe2\x80\x9d

She loves her dudes, though, and there\xe2\x80\x99s a connection between the stars of that original Guardians. Saldana is proud of how Pratt lost weight and got fit for the first movie while \xe2\x80\x9cstill remaining this super-humble and sweet and charming individual,\xe2\x80\x9d and she\xe2\x80\x99s continually wowed by Bautista\xe2\x80\x99s gentleness and subtlety.

\xe2\x80\x9cHe doesn\xe2\x80\x99t believe that he\xe2\x80\x99s funny,\xe2\x80\x9d Saldana says. \xe2\x80\x9cI hope that day doesn\xe2\x80\x99t come where Dave goes, \xe2\x80\x98You know what, you\xe2\x80\x99re (messing) up my take here.\xe2\x80\x99 \xe2\x80\x9d

More than anyone, the success of the original Guardians has been career-making for Bautista, a former pro wrestler who parlayed Drax into a high-profile role as the villainous Mr. Hinx in the 2015 James Bond movie Spectre.

His Marvel character looks like \xe2\x80\x9ca powerhouse who\xe2\x80\x99ll rip your head off and then he says something completely ridiculous,\xe2\x80\x9d says Bautista, though as emotionally scarred as he is, \xe2\x80\x9cthere's definitely a sense of innocence about him.\xe2\x80\x9d Drax also has a body full of tattoos, and Bautista had a sauna outside of his trailer to soak off all the makeup and prosthetics daily. \xe2\x80\x9cYou\xe2\x80\x99d think I\xe2\x80\x99m like a diva with a sauna. But no.\xe2\x80\x9d

Drax meets his quirky match in Klementieff\xe2\x80\x99s Mantis, and the French actress is impressed that Gunn is so good at casting. \xe2\x80\x9cEverybody he chose has a big heart and I think it shows on screen.\xe2\x80\x9d

The director wears his fandom on his sleeve, with pop-culture references aplenty and scads of Easter eggs and cameos born from a lifetime of reading comic books. "Anybody can delve into comic history and pull out obscure characters,\xe2\x80\x9d says Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige. \xe2\x80\x9cNot everybody can turn them into emotionally resonant and relatable characters that audiences can fall in love with.\xe2\x80\x9d

Gunn says the emotion he feels for his family and friends is \xe2\x80\x9ca bigger inspiration than even the comic-book characters.\xe2\x80\x9d He dedicated the movie to his parents in the audience at Vol. 2\xe2\x80\x99s Hollywood premiere, and Gunn looks out for those closest to him.

The filmmaker went to bat for his close friend Rooker when it came to casting Yondu. \xe2\x80\x9cI don\xe2\x80\x99t think I was Marvel\xe2\x80\x99s first choice. I\xe2\x80\x99m sure there are many other stars and actors that would have brought in more money,\xe2\x80\x9d Rooker says. \xe2\x80\x9cI wasn\xe2\x80\x99t in the room when he was convincing them, but I would bet you my right arm that he had my back in a big way.\xe2\x80\x9d

And Sean Gunn embraces his status as \xe2\x80\x9cthe utility infielder of the Guardians cast\xe2\x80\x9d with pride. Watching his older brother\xe2\x80\x99s rise has been \xe2\x80\x9cprobably more fun and gratifying for me than just about anyone. I feel like I\xe2\x80\x99ve had a front-row seat to his success.\xe2\x80\x9d

James Gunn has already started writing Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 to complete his trilogy, discussing the story with Pratt and having \xe2\x80\x9csome pretty intense conversations\xe2\x80\x9d with Saldana about a significant role in the threequel. The only travels Gunn has on his docket in the near future, though, are relaxing ones to \xe2\x80\x9cget my head on straight after three years of waking up and going to sleep and thinking about a talking raccoon.\xe2\x80\x9d

In the Marvel galaxy, there\xe2\x80\x99s room for more than one awesome space dad.

\xe2\x80\x9cI love these characters,\xe2\x80\x9d Gunn says. \xe2\x80\x9cIncluding my father and my dog, my mother had eight kids, and I have all these Guardians. They\xe2\x80\x99re my kids.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'They haven\xe2\x80\x99t appeared together since the Academy Awards that brought them the Best Picture Oscar. So it seemed only fitting that \xe2\x80\x9cMoonlight\xe2\x80\x9d filmmaker Barry Jenkins and playwright Tarell Alvin McCraney return home to Liberty City to celebrate and encourage others to pursue their potential.'

b'The #PumpRules SURver wanted to clear the air with her ex following this season's sit-down.

It was incredibly difficult to watch Scheana Shay and Mike Shay's confrontation at this season's Vanderpump Rules reunion. The exes were visibly upset with one another over how their relationship ended and what happened after they decided to call it quits, including Shay learning about the identity of Scheana's new boyfriend, Robert Valletta, for the first time.

Though Scheana and Shay seemed to end the reunion on good terms, giving each other their best wishes as they embraced, the experience still didn't sit well with the SURver. "I had sent him an email after the reunion because...I felt I was very harsh in certain parts of it, I felt a little cold in other parts of it, " Scheana revealed to E! News prior to the reunion airing. "And then, the way he found out about Rob, I felt I needed to just give a little more of an explanation. I felt like I just owed that to him because we've been friends for half our lives."





Scheana said that she never received a reply from Shay, but she heard through a mutual friend that he had read it, and "that was enough for me," she said. "I've said my piece."

During the sit-down, Shay expressed that he felt like Scheana had betrayed him by talking about his struggle with substance abuse on the show. "My job is to tell my story and put my life out there...I'm sorry I'm not going to keep my mouth shut about that anymore, we're not together anymore," Scheana told E! News in response. "Me opening up about this has helped so many women, too."

Scheana previously told The Daily Dish that, although coming face-to-face with Shay was difficult, it has ultimately helped her move on. "It was weird, but I think that day did bring some closure to me, at least," she said.

See what else Scheana had to say about the emotional reunion, below.'

b"Jenelle Evans and husband David Eason continued to show a united front on social media after a recent alleged domestic violence incident.

David posted photos on Instagram on Monday of a family outing to a pumpkin patch that included Jenelle's estranged mother Barbara Evans.

He shared snaps of their 20-month-old daughter Ensley sitting on a haystack with pumpkins in the background.

Family outing: David Eason shared photos on Instagram with wife Jenelle Evans during a recent pumpkin patch trip following a recent alleged domestic violence incident

David, 30, also uploaded pictures featuring the whole family on Sunday on Instagram showing them checking out a selection of gourds.

Jenelle, 26 was seen in the foreground of a photo with Ensley and her son Kaiser behind her as well as her mother Barbara.

The family outing came a week after Jenelle hysterically dialed 911 for help after her drunken spouse allegedly assaulted her at their home as she recovered from recent nose surgery.

A leaked recording of her frantic 911 call revealed that Dave had allegedly pinned her to the ground until she heard her 'collarbone crack.'

Pumpkin patch: The couple's daughter Ensley sat on a haystack during the family outing

Big pumpkin: Kaiser wrapped an arm around his sister Ensley as they hauled a giant pumpkin

Good times: Ensley beamed while hanging out with Kaiser on the pumpkin patch

Jenelle was taken to hospital after police responded to her call but no incident report was filed at the time.

A spokesperson for Jenelle downplayed the October 13 incident, insisting that she had tripped and fallen next to a bonfire while hosting friends at home.

The MTV persona walked back her accusations on Friday, telling E! News: 'It was a drunk and dramatic misunderstanding. Everything is great. We are totally fine...just taking time off social media, time to focus on ourselves and our family.'

Wagon ride: Jenelle's 20-month-old daughter shared a wagon with a big pumpkin

David and Jenelle started dating in September 2015 after meeting on Tinder.

Jenelle announced on Instagram in February 2017 that she and David were engaged.

The couple got married on September 23, 2017.

Jenelle has feuded with Barbara since giving her mother custody of Jace. They reached a custody agreement in May 2017 with Barbara maintaining primary custody and Jenelle granted visitation rights."

b'Prince Harry has disclosed that he sought counselling after enduring two years of \xe2\x80\x9ctotal chaos\xe2\x80\x9d while still struggling in his late twenties to come to terms with the death of his mother.

The Prince says in an interview with The Telegraph that he \xe2\x80\x9cshut down all his emotions\xe2\x80\x9d for almost two decades after losing his mother, Diana, Princess of Wales, despite his brother, Prince William, trying to persuade him to seek help.

Disclosing that he has spoken to a professional about his mental health, he describes how he only began to address his grief when he was 28 after feeling \xe2\x80\x9con the verge of punching someone\xe2\x80\x9d and facing anxiety during royal engagements.'

b'"When I was young I felt utterly alone, at times to the point of suicidal thoughts," Gunn wrote. "I never felt like I belonged, had an incredibly difficult time connecting to other people and, despite having love around me, I had an impossible time experiencing it, or taking it in."

Through movies and music, Gunn explained he became aware there were others like him out in the world.

"Suddenly I could see past the bland suburbs where I lived into a more magical world, a world more aligned with what I imagined," wrote Gunn. "Sometimes these works were simply escapist fantasies that distracted me from the difficulties of my internal life. But other times, in the strongest moments - maybe through the words of Alice Cooper or Freddie Mercury, through Cronenberg films, or even in Chewbacca's growl, I experienced something deeper - the realization that I wasn't completely alone."

Gunn stressed to fans who may feel how he once felt that they are not alone.

"They're a group of heartbroken misfits whose lives have been bereft of tenderness and connection and who have a nearly impossible time trusting themselves or others," Gunn wrote. "But they're learning, one step at a time. They are me. They are you. We are Groot."

Gunn expressed his heartfelt thanks to fans around the world for flocking to theaters to see his latest film.

Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 shot to $56.3 million Friday for a weekend debut in the $140 million range at the North American box office.

b'Save these ideas for later\xe2\x80\x94and follow Allure on Pinterest!

On Instagram, you may have seen your favorite beauty bloggers create looks inspired by Dominique D'Angelo, a professional makeup artist with about 244,000 followers on Instagram. She tells Allure that not only is dotted liner a way of adding texture to your look in a nontraditional way, it is a "comfortable step toward wearing something more daring than a classic liner. It can be as bold or as discreet as you'd like."

What other makeup should you have on when you're wearing dot eyeliner?

Hughes recommends keeping the rest of your makeup low-key with a fresh face and groomed brows, so the dots don't look "too theatrical." Instead, keeping your skin matte and your brows natural creates a perfect balance\xe2\x80\x94you know, kind of like a hamburger with salad, Hughes explains. She even compared the vibe you should go for to Alicia Keys's appearance on our February cover. As for lips, you have free reign to top with whatever color you want. "It's like pairing black liner with any lip color," Hughes says. Greta Agazzi, a professional makeup artist based in Italy, agrees. She tells Allure that she's into the minimalist look because it gives her "mime vibes." She's so right\xe2\x80\x94in the best way possible. You might not want to wear a black-and-white striped shirt, though. You know, just in case.

For Emma Robert's look, professional makeup artist Kara Yoshimoto Bua kept her look, which was inspired by Coco Chanel BTW, supersimple with neutral eye-shadow shades on the actress's lids. First, Bua smudged the taupe shade from the Tisse Camelia

Chanel Quadra Eyeshadow in Tiss\xc3\xa9 Gabrielle An eye-shadow palette with four cool, shimmery gray-based shades

onto the lower lash lines. Next, she brushed a shimmery brown onto the outer part of Roberts's upper lash line for "soft, natural definition," Bua says. Then, Bua swept a champagne powder on Roberts's upper lids, inner eyes, and brow bones to give her a lit-from-within glow. (These Best of Beauty-winning products can help you get there, too.) Then, she finished off with the petal pink shade on Roberts's creases.

And just how do you get those damn dots so precise?

Just last week, Flirt Cosmetics launched the Dot Dot Dot Dual Ended Liner ($22), which makes things hella easier. One side has your classic felt-tipped liner. The other has a special dotting applicator. Revlon also has a ball-point liner that has literally a ball point. Both option create the perfect spots. Hughes and D'Angelo also suggest using the round end of a makeup brush. You can dip it into a black liquid lipstick (we like the one from Sephora Collection), gel liner or create your own mixture with some setting spray and black eye shadow like Hughes does. The latter lets you be "in control of the consistency," Hughes says. "A watery one works best."

As for placement, use your pupils for alignment. Then, create dots either right below your lower lash lines, like Roberts's look, or below the folds and fine lines of your undereye area. Agazzi likes to wear them almost on top of her cheeks, so don't afraid to stray from your waterlines. And remember, as D'Angelo says, 'Dot liner is fun, hard to mess up, and it washes off at the end of the day!'"

b'Sofia Coppola's newest project is bound to be your guilty pleasure of the summer. The Beguiled, based on the 1966 novel A Painted Devil by Thomas P. Cullinan, is set in an isolated Southern boarding school for girls during the Civil War. When a wounded Union soldier found nearby and treated at the seminary, his stay results in seduction, envy and betrayal.

The film boasts a star-studded cast: Nicole Kidman is headmistress Martha Farnsworth, Colin Farrell plays the soldier, Kirsten Dunst portrays a teacher named Edwina and Elle Fanning is her rival, a student named Alicia.

The Beguiled is actually a remake of a 1971 film of the same name, which starred Clint Eastwood in Farrell's role. Although the original movie revolved around the soldier, Coppola's edition puts the focus on the women, and their complex dynamic within their secluded setting.

"The main crux of the story is about the dynamics between a group of women all stuck together, and then also the power shifts between men and women," Coppola told Entertainment Weekly. "So for me, it's very universal, but it's in this exotic setting of the Southern gentility."

The Beguiled comes to theaters on June 23. Watch the trailer below.

Picture format 1080i HDTV Original release May 4 ( ) \xe2\x80\x93

June 12, 2017 ( 2017-06-12 ) External links Website

Second Wives Club is an American reality television series that premiered on the E! Network on May 4, 2017. The show documents the personal and professional lives of a group of several women who are already or are to become the second, third, fourth or fifth wives of wealthy and successful men.

Cast [ edit ]

Guest Appearances [ edit ]

Eli Hammond - Himself, (a Certified Family Law Specialist, from Claery & Hammond, LLP.) Note: Attorney Hammond appeared as a guest on Second Wives Club, Season one, Episode 8, "Game Over".[7]

Production [ edit ]

The show was announced and production began in 2015. Since then, it has undergone name changes but is now officially called Second Wives Club.[8]

The trailer was released in April 2017. The show premiered on May 4, 2017.

On October 5, 2017 it was announced the show had ended after one season. A fan asked cast member Katie Cazorla on Twitter if there would be a second season and she stated that "I think E! is going in a different direction. So we're not coming back. It sucks because we rated well in the end and have awesome fans."[9]

Episodes [ edit ]

No. in

series Title Original air date U.S. viewers

(million) 1 "Don't Save the Date" May 4, 2017 ( ) N/A 2 "Mermaid Meltdown" May 11, 2017 ( ) N/A 3 "We're Going to Need a Big Boat" May 18, 2017 ( ) N/A 4 "Billionaire Matchmaker" May 25, 2017 ( ) N/A 5 "Fightin' Words" June 1, 2017 ( ) N/A 6 "Unhappy Campers" June 4, 2017 ( ) N/A 7 "Trouble in Paradise" June 11, 2017 ( ) N/A 8 "Eli Hammond" June 12, 2017 ( ) N/A

Lawsuit [ edit ]

Michael Obeng says his wife Veronika Obeng agreed to do the series which originally was called Second Wives Club in 2015. Michael agreed to participate in the show in hopes to promote his business, and because he thought it would spotlight their happy marriage. Veronika officially filed for divorce in 2016. Michael filed a lawsuit against the network in January 2016. The lawsuit states "The series was nothing about the couple's happy marriage." Obeng claimed that he was required to display an "unrealistic and manufactured personality" which could harm his business if the show is allowed to air. In a letter from his lawyer which was sent to E! Entertainment in August 2016, Obeng demanded that his children not to be included in the show. The letter identified the show under a new name Famously Married. Obeng is suing NBCUniversal the parent company of the E! Network. The suit seeks an injunction barring the network from airing or promoting the episode in which Obeng appears.[10]'

b'Holmes shared several photos of their vacation on Instagram, including a slow-motion video of Suri throwing a football

Katie Holmes and Suri Cruise Enjoy Their Vacation at the Beach -- See the Cute Photos!

Time for some mother-daughter bonding!

Katie Holmes, 38, and her 10-year-old daughter, Suri, celebrated the Easter holiday with family at a beach in Florida. The Batman Begins actress shared several photos of their vacation on Instagram, including a slow-motion video of Suri throwing a football.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

One of her posts included members of her family, with the caption, \xe2\x80\x9c#family #love #gratitude.\xe2\x80\x9d

In another post, Holmes also posted a photo of Suri in a dress featuring lemons while the caption read, \xe2\x80\x9c#lemonade,\xe2\x80\x9d a clear reference to Beyonc\xc3\xa9\xe2\x80\x98s Lemonade album.

The mother-daughter duo also took a sweet picture together, with Holmes writing, \xe2\x80\x9cMy sweetie. #love #beach #gratitude,\xe2\x80\x9d in the caption.

Suri celebrates her 11th birthday on Tuesday, which might have made her mom a bit sentimental. Holmes recently shared an adorable black-and-white throwback of her daughter, who holds her hair back as she totes a tiny bag and smiles off-camera.

\xe2\x80\x9c#tbt my sweet angel,\xe2\x80\x9d Holmes wrote.'

b'Dancing with the Stars Disney Night was an enchanting evening full of classic Disney music, plus some new tunes from upcoming Disney movies Ralph Breaks the Internet and The Nutcracker and the Four Realms. The show also features performances by Dancing with the Stars Juniors host Jordan Fisher, the kid pros and kid stars! Here's a recap of Disney Night, including the scores and what judges Carrie Ann Inaba, Len Goodman, and Bruno Tonioli had to say about all the magical Disney Night performances.

VIDEO: Watch all the performances from Week 5: Disney Night

Alexis & Alan: "The way you danced made me believe in fairy tales," said Carrie Ann Inaba after Alexis and Alan's foxtrot to "Just Around the Riverbend" from Pocahontas. They received a 10, a 9, and a 10 for a total score of 29 out of 30.

Juan Pablo & Cheryl: Juan Pablo and Cheryl's Viennese Waltz to "Gaston" from Beauty & The Beast was "spot on, on every level!" cheered Bruno. Carrie Ann called Juan Pablo spectacular. "You, without a doubt, are a fantastic dancer," said Len. This team also received a 10, a 9, and a 10, for a total of 29 out of 30.

Juan Pablo and Cheryl's Beauty & The Beast Viennese Waltz

DeMarcus & Lindsay: "That is like a Disney movie, you finish it and you just feel great!" said Len of DeMarcus and Lindsay's Charleston to "A Star Is Born," from Hercules. They earned a 9, an 8, and another 9 for a score of 26 out of 30.

DeMarcus and Lindsay's fun Charleston to "A Star Is Born" from Hercules

Evanna & Keo: Evanna and Keo's dance was a Jazz to "When Will My Life Begin" from Tangled. "It had a lovely feel to it" said Len, but added he couldn't call it a spectacular number. Carrie Ann and Bruno also offered constructive criticism to Evanna, and the couple received three 8s for a total of 24 out of 30.

Grocery Store Joe & Jenna: "Go Joe!" said Carrie Ann. "That was a vast improvement!" She complimented Joe for not missing any steps. Bruno felt the timing was still not perfect but said Joe did a baby step in the right direction, and Len praised Joe for getting knocked down each week, and coming back to give it his all the following week. Joe and Jenna's Jive to "Zero" from the upcoming Disney movie Ralph Breaks the Internet earned them a 6, a 5, and another 6 for a total of 17 out of 30.

Grocery Store Joe and Jenna's Ralph Breaks the Internet Jive

Mary Lou & Sasha: Mary Lou was emotional after her Contemporary number with Sasha to "Reflection" from Mulan. She credits Dancing with the Stars for helping her be vulnerable and open. Len liked that her dance was gentle and understated, with lovely fluidity. Bruno said he loved her determination and that she doesn't give up. Mary Lou and Sasha received a 9, an 8, and another 8 for a total score of 25 out of 30.

Mary Lou and Sasha dance a contemporary to "Reflection" from Mulan

John & Emma: John and Emma danced a Quickstep to "I Wan'na Be Like You" from The Jungle Book, which has been one of John's favorite songs since he was a kid. "I thought you did a spectacular job!" said Len, adding, "It's transpired, in my opinion, to be your best dance to date!" Bruno and Carrie Ann agreed that it was John's best performance so far, and he received his highest score yet, three 8s for a total of 24 out of 30.

John and Emma's Jungle Book Quickstep

Bobby & Sharna: Bobby and Sharna did an enchanting Waltz to The Little Mermaid's "Part Of Your World." "A proper Waltz, and pretty well done," proclaimed Len. Carrie Ann advised Bobby to try not to giggle with his whole body while he dances. The judges awarded Bobby and Sharna three 7s, for a total score of 21 out of 30.

Milo & Witney: "Fantastic performance, full of life, full of zest!" said Carrie Ann. "I don't have any complaints about that, it was a blockbuster!" raved Bruno. The pair, who danced a Quickstep to "Incredits 2" from The Incredibles 2, received a 9, an 8, and a 10 for a score of 27 out of 30.

While Tom announced that partners DeMarcus and Lindsay and Alexis and Alan were in jeopardy, it turned out no one was going home, because it was Disney Night!

Catch weekly video highlights and watch full episodes of Dancing with the Stars on ABC.com or the ABC app and don't miss Dancing with the Stars LIVE Mondays 8|7c on ABC!'

b'The couple\xe2\x80\x99s concerns about being kept away from Carly mounted in season 7. Catelynn broke down while the two were talking to Dawn after they had made plans to meet Carly\xe2\x80\x99s adoptive parents. \xe2\x80\x9cI try not to make it difficult,\xe2\x80\x9d she said, tearing up. "I\xe2\x80\x99m willing and trying and offering. And then I get ignored for months and I try. I feel like I get punished because my kid asks questions about me, or she wants to know where she comes from. What [did they] think adoption is? She\xe2\x80\x99s going to do that."'

b'She\xe2\x80\x99s back! In an unexpected and welcome surprise Sunday evening (4/29), Carrie Underwood was revealed to be the National Anthem performer ahead of the Nashville Predators\xe2\x80\x99 Stanley Cup playoff game.

The crowd, complete with red Nissan-sponsored light sabers, quickly jumped to their feet when the arena\xe2\x80\x99s announcer revealed the surprise guest to center ice. As each high note was hit, fans quickly applauded the country powerhouse\xe2\x80\x99s vocal abilities.

Underwood is a huge fan of the Nashville Predators, as both a resident of Music City and the wife of one of the players, Mike Fisher. She is often seen celebrating the team\xe2\x80\x99s triumphs from a box within Bridgestone Arena.

\xe2\x80\x9cI think going to the Stanley Cup Finals last year was such a confidence booster. I mean, nobody expected them to make it as far as they did. I did, but [laughs] nobody else. We seem to be the underdogs in every single situation. And seeing Mike and hearing Mike talking about those guys and how much talent was on the ice and how much they had in them, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t surprising to me at all that they made it to the finals last year,\xe2\x80\x9d Underwood said of the team spirit recently.

On Friday (4/27), the Preds faced an unfortunate loss against the Winnipeg Jets in game one of the second round of playoffs. After Sunday night\xe2\x80\x99s game, the teams will move to Winnipeg for the next few games.

The Oklahoma native performed the Star-Spangled Banner last year during the Predators first run in the Stanely Cup playoffs. Since then, many other country stars, including Dierks Bentley, Vince Gill, Maren Morris, among others, have taken to the ice for surprise performances.'

b'"In my life I go, \xe2\x80\x98Oh my goodness, look at all these beautiful wonderful things that I have, I should be so happy,\xe2\x80\x99 but you can\xe2\x80\x99t help it if you wake up in the morning and you are so tired and you are so sad and you are so full of anxiety that you can barely think," she says. Williams invited Gaga to participate after he read an open letter she issued through her Born This Way Foundation in which she revealed a sexual assault at 19 that left her with PTSD.\n\n\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s time that everyone speaks up and really feels very normal about mental health; it\xe2\x80\x99s the same as physical health. Everybody has mental health and we shouldn\xe2\x80\x99t be ashamed of it and just having a conversation with a friend or family member can really make such a difference," William says from a room at Kensington Palace. "For me, the little bits that I\xe2\x80\x99ve learnt so far is that it\xe2\x80\x99s really important to have this conversation. You won\xe2\x80\x99t be judged."'

b'After Nick Viall and his pro partner Peta Murgatroyd were eliminated from \xe2\x80\x9cDancing With the Stars\xe2\x80\x9d Monday night, he was clearly disappointed but his initial reaction seemed gracious.

The recent \xe2\x80\x9cBachelor\xe2\x80\x9d star said the right things before the cameras, gushing about Murgatroyd and the whole \xe2\x80\x9cDWTS\xe2\x80\x9d experience, saying, \xe2\x80\x9cI had such an amazing time with Peta. She\xe2\x80\x99s a fantastic partner; we had fun all the time.\xe2\x80\x9d

But behind the scenes it might have been a different story, with Viall reportedly attributing his failure to win enough votes from viewers to people and situations beyond his ballroom dance abiilty, according to the tabloid OK!

Viall felt that Murgatroyd, who gave birth earlier this year, didn\xe2\x80\x99t give it her all. He also was telling other cast members that he thought he was facing backlash over the recent arrest of fellow \xe2\x80\x9cBachelor\xe2\x80\x9d alum Chris Soules, a source told OK!

Soules, who competed on Season 19 of \xe2\x80\x9cThe Bachelor\xe2\x80\x9d in 2015, was arrested last week in connection with a truck crash in Iowa that killed a 66-year-old farmer. Soules has been charged with leaving the scene of a traffic fatality and is being investigated for possibly driving under the influence at the time of the crash.

\xe2\x80\x9cHe was not in a good mood after being eliminated and told cast members that he felt like Chris Soules\xe2\x80\x99 incident had an impact on him,\xe2\x80\x9d an insider told OK! \xe2\x80\x9cBasically, he was blaming everyone else but himself.\xe2\x80\x9d

The OK! report didn\xe2\x80\x99t mention that \xe2\x80\x9cStar Trek\xe2\x80\x9d legend William Shatner, a rabid, high-profile \xe2\x80\x9cDancing WIth the Stars\xe2\x80\x9d fan, campaigned against Viall. Early in this season of the TV ballroom dance competition, Shatner took to Twitter to urge other viewers to vote Viall off the show.

Viall and Mugatroyd did an Argentine tango Monday night and received two nines and two eights from the judges, but it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t enough to keep them in the competition.

The site Wellpaint said it looked like Murgatroyd put a lot into her performances with Viall \xe2\x80\x94 and her effort probably brought the two of them further in this highly competitive season than most fans expected.

After Viall was eliminated, he called his loss a \xe2\x80\x9cbummer\xe2\x80\x9d before being asked about Soules, who was said to be a friend of his. He called it a \xe2\x80\x9cterrible situation.\xe2\x80\x9d

\xe2\x80\x9cObviously more than anything my heart goes out to the person who passed away and their family and I\xe2\x80\x99m just praying for everyone involved,\xe2\x80\x9d he said, according to E! News.

Whether Viall is bitter about the \xe2\x80\x9cDancing With the Stars\xe2\x80\x9d exit, he has said that he\xe2\x80\x99s ready to leave behind the world of reality TV for good.

\xe2\x80\x9cMy time in reality TV is probably done,\xe2\x80\x9d the 36-year-old told Life & Style Weekly. Instead he\xe2\x80\x99s focused on launching a grooming line and spending more time with his \xe2\x80\x9cBachelor\xe2\x80\x9d fiancee Vanessa Grimaldi.

\xe2\x80\x9cVanessa and I, we\xe2\x80\x99re going to keep doing our thing,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. \xe2\x80\x9cDancing\xe2\x80\x99s over, that\xe2\x80\x99s a bummer, but I\xe2\x80\x99m really looking forward to the future and definitely spending more time with the business and Vanessa.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b"The Late Late Show With James Corden type TV Show genre Talk Show Where to watch Close Streaming Options

If you have been watching late night TV, you know Lip Sync Battle is far from the only battle in town. Starting almost a full year ago, The Late Late Show\xe2\x80\x99s unflappable host James Corden debuted new fixture called \xe2\x80\x9cDrop the Mic.\xe2\x80\x9d The fun segment finds the Carpool Karaoke maestro turning his vocal stylings up a notch and dishing rap disses as he squares off against various guests. The stars bring it, too, and the resulting rap battles have been a study in badass rhyming, quick thinking, and \xe2\x80\x94 wait for it \xe2\x80\x94 mic dropping. The segment has become so popular, in fact, that an independent stand-alone spinoff is set to debut this fall.

For a full dose of heated rap battles, read on for a roundup of every \xe2\x80\x9cDrop the Mic\xe2\x80\x9d moment with MC Corden and his celebrity opponents.

1. James Corden vs. Anne Hathaway

For the first round of \xe2\x80\x9cDrop the Mic,\xe2\x80\x9d Corden faced off against actress and singer Anne Hathaway, and they both went there. Corden teased the actress for her turn as Oscars host, and Hathaway mused that the late night host\xe2\x80\x99s wife watches Seth Meyers instead. Both players had to hand it to the other \xe2\x80\x94 Hathaway reluctantly nodded after a jab that \xe2\x80\x9cthat was good,\xe2\x80\x9d and Corden observed that her diss about his One Direction game \xe2\x80\x9cwas actually mean.\xe2\x80\x9d In the end, the audience\xe2\x80\x99s applause made it clear who dominated this round.

Winner: Anne Hathaway

2. James Corden vs. David Schwimmer vs. Rebel Wilson

After the first round went so well, Corden and co. whipped up another segment just the next day, and included some surprises. What was supposed to be a match between Schwimmer and Corden became a three-way fight when Rebel Wilson showed up \xe2\x80\x9ccompletely unannounced.\xe2\x80\x9d Corden mined Friends and even The People v. O. J. Simpson: American Crime Story for material against Schwimmer, and in turn, the actor who brought Ross Geller to life played dirty, wondering why Corden\xe2\x80\x99s wife married him: \xe2\x80\x9cMy bad, she blind?\xe2\x80\x9d Rebel killed in the end, though, serving up barbs for Schwimmer (\xe2\x80\x9cYour career\xe2\x80\x99s a mistake / It\xe2\x80\x99s like Ross and Rachel / It\xe2\x80\x99s on a break\xe2\x80\x9d) and Corden (\xe2\x80\x9cCarpool Karaoke, you think it\xe2\x80\x99s your big thing / But everyone is thinking, \xe2\x80\x98Shut up and let Adele sing!'\xe2\x80\x9d).

Winner: Rebel Wilson

3. James Corden vs. Kevin Hart

Corden trotted out fellow funnyman Hart, and truly nothing was off the table. The host pulled out all the stops and made fun of Hart for his height (\xe2\x80\x9cYou might think like a man / But you\xe2\x80\x99re built like a boy\xe2\x80\x9d), even bringing out a step stool for the comic. Hart\xe2\x80\x99s response: a zesty \xe2\x80\x9cGet that out my face!\xe2\x80\x9d The Ride Along star wasn\xe2\x80\x99t going to be outdone, though, and did what many of the participants have done by criticizing Corden\xe2\x80\x99s career: \xe2\x80\x9cI admit, most people nice to your face / Until they get home and realize you\xe2\x80\x99re not Ricky Gervais.\xe2\x80\x9d

Winner: Kevin Hart (Are we sensing a pattern here yet?)

4. James Corden vs. Cara Delevingne vs. Dave Franco

Next we saw another three-way showdown, as both Delevingne and Franco showed up to shut down Corden on his own turf. After some rather off-color jokes, Franco scored his best line: \xe2\x80\x9cJames, your show ends at 1:30 every week / So hello to the pets whose owners fell asleep!\xe2\x80\x9d Both Franco and Corden picked on Delevingne for her unusually robust eyebrows, but the unfazed actress and model targeted both of her opponents with one effective gibe: \xe2\x80\x9cYou\xe2\x80\x99re both shorter than me / And I think that you will find / I\xe2\x80\x99ve hooked up with hotter girls than both of you combined.\xe2\x80\x9d

Winner: Cara Delevingne

5. James Corden vs. Usain Bolt

Last November, the \xe2\x80\x9cDrop the Mic\xe2\x80\x9d crew took things in a new direction, pairing Corden with Jamaican Gold medalist Usain Bolt. The two tried to intimidate each other, with Bolt assuring Corden, \xe2\x80\x9cAll I do is win.\xe2\x80\x9d Corden asked the athlete, \xe2\x80\x9cYou sure you\xe2\x80\x99re ready for this? / \xe2\x80\x98Cause you\xe2\x80\x99re on my track now.\xe2\x80\x9d Things started off nasty and went downhill from there, and the scales were definitely tipped against the TV host. Bolt took a swipe with this line: \xe2\x80\x9cYou never shoulda started / You probably shoulda fled / I run my race in 10 seconds / You last that long in bed!\xe2\x80\x9d And Corden came back with his own jab: \xe2\x80\x9cWhen your endorsements dry up / Hey, you can call me / We always need more PAs to run and get me coffee!\xe2\x80\x9d Good one, Corden, but in the end, the Olympic champion couldn\xe2\x80\x99t be beat.

Winner: Usain Bolt

6. James Corden vs. Riz Ahmed

The most recent matchup went down in April, with The Night Of star Riz Ahmed becoming the latest contestant to trade repartee with the British late night personality. Their jabs were both mean and topical, touching on Unites Airlines and Sean Spicer, but the best exchanges had to do with Ahmed in the Star Wars film Rogue One: \xe2\x80\x9cHonestly, it\xe2\x80\x99s mean to say in Star Wars he stinks / He made me miss the days of Jar Jar Binks,\xe2\x80\x9d taunted Corden. \xe2\x80\x9cYeah, I did do Star Wars / I bet that made you mad / Too bad they weren\xe2\x80\x99t tryin\xe2\x80\x99 to cast Jabba the Hutt\xe2\x80\x99s dad,\xe2\x80\x9d Ahmed rapped back. It was a pretty even match, but Ahmed swooped in with one last zinger: \xe2\x80\x9cYour jokes on the mic are spent / I saw you at Coachella / You were the big white tent.\xe2\x80\x9d

Winner: Riz Ahmed"

b'Giraffe kisses! April the giraffe\xe2\x80\x99s calf has met his dad, Oliver, and it made for the most precious, heartwarming photo ever!

Animal Adventure Park in Harpursville, New York, tweeted the adorable snap of the father-son introduction on Tuesday, April 18. In the pic, Oliver leans down and touches his baby\xe2\x80\x99s nose through a fence. (Oliver is currently separated from April and the calf for their safety.) \xe2\x80\x9cDad & Baby meet!\xe2\x80\x9d the tweet read.

The zoo owner, Jordan Patch, told Good Morning America on Monday, April 17, that it\xe2\x80\x99s rare for male giraffes to help with their newborns\xe2\x80\x99 upbringing. \xe2\x80\x9cOliver \xe2\x80\x94 usually males have no part in raising of the young \xe2\x80\x94 [but] he\xe2\x80\x99s actually been quite inquisitive and getting nose to nose with baby,\xe2\x80\x9d he said. \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s creating some very cute moments.\xe2\x80\x9d

As fans all over the world saw via livestream, April the giraffe gave birth to her fourth calf on Saturday, April 15, after 16 months of pregnancy. Approximately 1.2 million people watched as she welcomed the baby, who weighed 129 pounds and measured 5 feet, 9 inches.

The newborn giraffe doesn\xe2\x80\x99t yet have a name since Animal Adventure Park is holding a contest to name the calf. Animal lovers everywhere can submit a name for the baby until April 25 at nameaprilscalf.com. Each submission costs $1 with a minimum purchase of five name suggestions for $5. At the end of the voting period, the zoo will open another voting contest with the 10 most popular names. All proceeds will benefit giraffe conservation events, the zoo and Ava\xe2\x80\x99s Little Heroes, a charity for families who face unexpected medical expenses.'

b'Olivia Munn is already moving on with her life. Following the end of her relationship with NFL star Aaron Rodgers, the actress is reportedly dating a new man. Has Munn already put Rodgers\xe2\x80\x99 family drama behind her?

Radar Online reports that Munn was caught getting extra cozy with Trevor Noah this past weekend. The two allegedly met up twice over the extended weekend, including a romantic lunch in East Village. The actress donned heels, a camo jacket, and a leopard pattern romper for the outing while the comedian wore a casual blue outfit. The two appeared more than happy during their lunch, though it isn\xe2\x80\x99t clear if they are actually dating.

Munn has not been spotted with other men since her breakup with Rodgers. The two parted ways because Rodgers was reportedly tired of all her drama. Munn went on a romp with her girlfriends after the split and looked content living the single life. Rodgers and Munn have not commented on their breakup, though an insider told E! Online that both parties are coping well with the split.

The source explained how their relationship had been on shaky ground for months prior to the breakup. Olivia Munn and Aaron Rodgers, however, tried to make things work even though they knew a split was bound to happen. Fortunately, it sounds like they are both moving on and doing well.

Aaron Rodgers and Olivia Munn

[Image by Jason Merritt/Getty Images][/caption]

In fact, Rodgers was recently spotted at the wedding of his Green Bay Packers teammate, Randall Cobb, and looked happier than ever. Of course, with Munn officially out of the picture, Rodgers has plenty of options at his disposal, though sources claim that he\xe2\x80\x99s a pretty picky guy when it comes to women.

As far as Munn\xe2\x80\x99s romantic life is concerned, the insider believes that she will not settle with anyone until she knows for sure their romance will last. Munn and Rodgers dated for over three years before calling it quits and were rumored to be on the verge of an engagement.

\xe2\x80\x9cOlivia is not going to settle till she feels like this is the man she will end up with,\xe2\x80\x9d the source shared. \xe2\x80\x9cHer eyes are open and she is very open to dating. She is good!\xe2\x80\x9d

While Munn and Rodgers\xe2\x80\x99 relationship is over, the insider didn\xe2\x80\x99t rule out a possible reconciliation. For now, however, the two are taking a break and are not planning on getting back together.

Tell us! Do you think Olivia Munn and Aaron Rodgers have any hope of a reconciliation? Let us know in the comments below.

[Featured Image by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images]'

b'Performing at the Oscars and working on a new pilot are pretty exciting things, however, Auli\xe2\x80\x99i Cravalho is more excited about going home.

\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m really excited to be back on my home island, and to see my family, my friends, to see my cat,\xe2\x80\x9d she shared just after performing on Dancing With The Stars earlier this week.

Auli\xe2\x80\x99i adds that she\xe2\x80\x99ll be attending her first prom, too!

\xe2\x80\x9cI actually get to be somewhat of a normal 16-year-old and it\xe2\x80\x99s all I can ask for right now.\xe2\x80\x9d

But, before she leaves, we have to know \xe2\x80\x94 is Dancing With The Stars in the cards for her?

\xe2\x80\x9cI don\xe2\x80\x99t know how they do it\xe2\x80\xa6I was thinking about it in my trailer, I was like, \xe2\x80\x98I could\xef\xbf\xbd\xe2\x80\x99 and then I hit my hand into the wall and I\xe2\x80\x99m like, \xe2\x80\x98Clearly not.\xe2\x80\x99 I can sing, but I can\xe2\x80\x99t do what they did.\xe2\x80\x9d

Auli\xe2\x80\x99i adds, \xe2\x80\x9cI love dancing\xe2\x80\xa6in the comfort of my own home. So, you know what? Why not share that? What\xe2\x80\x99s a journey without a few bruises along the way.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'Harry Styles knows that you care way more than you should about his relationship with ex-girlfriend Taylor Swift, and he's ready to play with your feelings a little more.

Onstage at one of his concerts the other night, Styles mentioned Swift in such a sly way, that fans are already praying for a reunion. Wishing an audience member happy birthday, Styles asked how old she was turning, to which the fan replied, "22." It's not hard to guess what happened next.

Announcing the news to the audience, Styles said, "22. She\xe2\x80\x99s 22, okay? I don\xe2\x80\x99t know about..." And as every Swift fan knows, that's exactly how the lyrics to "22" go. You can watch the whole interaction on Twitter:



Unfortunately, Styles didn't launch into a full-on cover of "22," although he should definitely consider doing so in a future set.

Styles and Swift started dating in November 2012, and were photographed together for the first time in December the same year, when they were spotted in Central Park. Perez Hilton reported their breakup on January 7, 2013, with a source revealing, "They are both really busy and never in one place for long. Harry's really upset about the split and is really sensitive about it." They both went on to write songs about each other.

Recognizing the search engine\xe2\x80\x99s comedy potential when it comes to song lyrics, Jimmy Fallon filtered through some classic hits so his Colossal guest, Anne Hathaway, could sing Google Translate versions on Monday\xe2\x80\x99s The Tonight Show .

When fed through Google Translate and back again, The Weeknd\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cCan\xe2\x80\x99t Feel My Face\xe2\x80\x9d becomes the popular track \xe2\x80\x9cMy Front Is Not Felt\xe2\x80\x9d with the refrain, \xe2\x80\x9cIn your presence, my front is not felt. Hey, it is good. Hey, it is good.\xe2\x80\x9d

Gloria Gaynor\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cI Will Survive\xe2\x80\x9d becomes \xe2\x80\x9cI Will Be Punctual.\xe2\x80\x9d Fallon tried to stand alongside Hathaway, who won an Oscar for her musical performance in Les Mis\xc3\xa9rables, by singing, \xe2\x80\x9cNot good for me, I will be punctual unless I know with love\xe2\x80\x99s knowledge I\xe2\x80\x99m aware that I\xe2\x80\x99m aware.\xe2\x80\x9d

As is the tradition with song-based games on The Tonight Show, this one ended with a duet between Fallon and Hathaway on Pink and Nate Ruess\xe2\x80\x99 \xe2\x80\x9cOnly Tell Me Grounds\xe2\x80\x9d (non-translated as \xe2\x80\x9cJust Give Me a Reason\xe2\x80\x9d). \xe2\x80\x9cRight from the start you were a thief, you stole my heart,\xe2\x80\x9d becomes, \xe2\x80\x9cAt the outset, you are a felon who took my center.\xe2\x80\x9d

b"Fitness guru Richard Simmons has been hospitalized in California for \xe2\x80\x9csevere indigestion.\xe2\x80\x9d

Simmons\xe2\x80\x99s spokesperson Michael Catalano told ABC News that he the 68-year-old celebrity is doing better after he was hospitalized in an \xe2\x80\x9cundisclosed location\xe2\x80\x9d Monday.

\xe2\x80\x9cAfter a few days of battling severe indigestion and discomfort while eating, we agreed it was best for him to seek treatment,\xe2\x80\x9d Catalano told ABC.

Simmons been out of a public eye for a number of years. His absence spurred the podcast Missing Richard Simmons. Earlier this month, however, Simmons signed a merchandising deal after the podcast brought his story back into the public eye.

Simmons is expected to make a full recovery, according to Catalano.

b'The timeless question that every parent must confront: how do we want to raise our children? To be happy, down-to-earth, and well-adjusted to the real world, most of us would say. Turns out that\xe2\x80\x99s exactly what the Duchess and Duke of Cambridge would say too.

Raising them her way

Mum Kate Middleton is definitely taking a no-nonsense approach to parenting, according to RadarOnline.com\xe2\x80\x99s palace sources. Far from being spoilt by attention, 3-year-old Prince George and 2-year-old Princess Charlotte \xe2\x80\x9chave absolutely no idea that they\xe2\x80\x99re royals\xe2\x80\x9d.

\xe2\x80\x9cThey might look like perfect tots in photos, but at home they play in the mud, fall off ponies, and have screaming tantrums!\xe2\x80\x9d That\xe2\x80\x99s a description that no mum of toddlers would be surprised at.

The plucky mum is making sure her tots are raised with all the discipline and levelheadedness that normal children receive \xe2\x80\x94 royal tradition be damned. Kate shields her babies from the public as much as possible, according to one source. She has also told palace aides that \xe2\x80\x9cher kids will be raised her way\xe2\x80\x9d.

\xe2\x80\x9cIt would absolutely horrify Elizabeth. But Kate insists the kids should be allowed to be normal children. Never in royal history have the children in direct line to the throne been raised in such a modern way.\xe2\x80\x9d

Kate is clearly drawing lessons from her own middle-class upbringing \xe2\x80\x94 her mum Carol was an air hostess with British Airways while her father Michael was a flight dispatcher.

And the dauntless mum is proving that she isn\xe2\x80\x99t shy about defying centuries of royal tradition, all for the sake of her kids. Kate and William have reportedly enrolled little George in a normal middle-class school in suburban London.

A more orthodox choice would have been William\xe2\x80\x99s first school, Wetherby Prep \xe2\x80\x94 a much more \xe2\x80\x9cposh\xe2\x80\x9d school.

In today\xe2\x80\x99s fast-changing world, many of us worry about how to prepare our kids for success. Sounds like Kate is taking charge of her little ones\xe2\x80\x99 futures early on!

Parenting rules Kate and William live by

All parents aspire to bring up humble, well-mannered children, and Kate and William certainly have a tougher job than most. So far, it\xe2\x80\x99s been amazing to see the couple\xe2\x80\x99s dedication to making sure their kids will grow up down-to-earth and gracious \xe2\x80\x94 royal or not.

Here are some great insights that the royal mum and dad have given into their parenting approach over the years:

Taking a break

\xe2\x80\x9cTime out\xe2\x80\x9d is a common method of discipline that parents turn to \xe2\x80\x94 Kate calls it \xe2\x80\x9ctaking a break\xe2\x80\x9d instead. When little George does something naughty, he sits in a corner of his room and plays with a special calming toy or fuzzy book.

Playing music

When prince George throws a royal screaming fit, his parents play his favourite African drumming music. Sounds like a great way to calm down wailing toddlers without exhausting yourself!

Imitating his tantrums

Kate has an even more creative solution to little George\xe2\x80\x99s tantrums. When he throws a tantrum on the floor, the Duchess doesn\xe2\x80\x99t hesitate to get down and scream along. (Which mum hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been tempted to do that?) George finds this hilarious and it calms him right down.

Helping to clean up

Like all parents, Kate and William are no stranger to mealtime battles \xe2\x80\x94 flinging food on the floor, barfing sounds, the works. If George does this, the rule is that he must help clean up and won\xe2\x80\x99t get a replacement meal, only milk.

Less things, please

Prince William refused to divulge what gifts three-year-old Prince George received on his birthday in 2016, \xe2\x80\x9cI am not telling, he got too many things, he\xe2\x80\x99s far too spoiled.\xe2\x80\x9d

While they certainly have the means to pamper their tots with material goods, the royal parents are clearly determined that George and Charlotte will grow up to value more important things in life.

Giving them a normal life

Speaking to GQ last month, William revealed how dearly he valued normalcy for his children. \xe2\x80\x9cI want George to grow up in a real, living environment, I don\xe2\x80\x99t want him growing up behind palace walls, he has to be out there. The media make it harder but I will fight for them to have a normal life.\xe2\x80\x9d

Like all parents, family is the centre of his world for this dad. \xe2\x80\x9cI could not do my job without the stability of the family. Stability at home is so important to me. I want to bring up my children in a happy, stable, secure world.\xe2\x80\x9d

Being a Modern Old-Fashioned Mom

One of Kate\xe2\x80\x99s go-to parenting guides is apparently The Modern Mother\xe2\x80\x99s Handbook: How To Raise A Happy, Healthy, Smart, Disciplined and Interesting Child, Starting From Birth. The anonymous author calls herself a Modern Old-Fashioned Mom, and her book offers no-nonsense tips for raising kids from bubs to teens.

Some gems include \xe2\x80\x9cset a good example and then stand back and watch\xe2\x80\x9d and \xe2\x80\x9cdon\xe2\x80\x99t force your kids to do things\xe2\x80\x9d. Definitely a page-turner if you\xe2\x80\x99re wondering how to square up traditional values with modern changes for your little ones.

b'Gina Rodriguez will be starring in yet another \xe2\x80\x9cCarmen Sandiego\xe2\x80\x9d project for Netflix.

The \xe2\x80\x9cJane the Virgin\xe2\x80\x9d star will topline a live-action film for the steamer. Rodriguez will star in and produce the movie through her I Can and I Will Productions, alongside producers Kevin Misher and Caroline Fraser. Andy Berman of Misher Films is the executive producer.

Rodriguez is also voicing the title character in Netflix\xe2\x80\x99s upcoming animated \xe2\x80\x9cCarmen Sandiego\xe2\x80\x9d series, which will start streaming in 2019.

Houghton Mifflin Harcourt is the owner of the \xe2\x80\x9cCarmen Sandiego\xe2\x80\x9d property. Fraser is the head of HMH Productions and the executive producer of the \xe2\x80\x9cCarmen Sandiego\xe2\x80\x9d Netflix original series and feature film. A line of books from HMH featuring Sandiego will launch in 2019 timed to the series debut.

The movie will be a standalone Carmen Sandiego adventure. No writer or director is attached to the pic yet.

\xe2\x80\x9cCarmen Sandiego\xe2\x80\x9d is an educational computer game franchise that follows Sandiego as she travels across the world stealing national treasure. Sandiego has been the main antagonist of several games, including \xe2\x80\x9cWhere in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?\xe2\x80\x9d In addition, she was featured in multiple books, live-action game shows, and the animated series \xe2\x80\x9cWhere on Earth Is Carmen Sandiego,\xe2\x80\x9d which ran for 40 episodes between 1994 and 1998.

Rodriguez is set to produce and topline the film \xe2\x80\x9cSomeone Great\xe2\x80\x9d for Netflix. She also has a starring role in Sony\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cMiss Bala,\xe2\x80\x9d which hits theaters on Jan. 25, 2019. Rodriguez continues to star in CW\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cJane the Virgin.\xe2\x80\x9d

Rodriguez is repped by CAA and attorney Karl Austen. The news was first reported by Deadline Hollywood.'
